title: DataSetEventModel
description: Dataset and event default and resource additional configuration model. Inherits all properties from PublishedNodesEntryModel and adds mapped properties for samplingInterval, publishingInterval, keyFrameCount, and StartInstance.

DataSetClassId.description: The optional dataset class id as it shall appear in dataset messages and dataset metadata.

DataSetPublishingInterval.description: The publishing interval used for a grouped set of nodes under a certain DataSetWriter, expressed in milliseconds.

DataSetPublishingIntervalTimespan.description: The publishing interval for a dataset writer, expressed as a TimeSpan value.

DataSetKeyFrameCount.description: Controls key frame insertion frequency in the message stream.

SendKeepAliveDataSetMessages.description: Controls whether to send keep alive messages for this dataset.

MaxKeepAliveCount.description: Defines how many publishing timer expirations to wait before sending a keep-alive message.

DataSetDescription.description: The optional description of the dataset.

DataSetExtensionFields.description: Optional key-value pairs inserted into key frame and metadata messages in the same data set.

MessagingMode.description: The messaging mode to use when publishing the data sets in the writer group.

MessageEncoding.description: The encoding format to use for messages in the writer group.

WriterGroupPartitions.description: Specifies how many partitions to split the writer group into when publishing to target topics.

DisableSubscriptionTransfer.description: Controls whether subscription transfer is disabled during reconnect.

RepublishAfterTransfer.description: Controls whether to republish missed values after a subscription is transferred during reconnect handling.

OpcNodeWatchdogTimespan.description: The timeout duration used to monitor whether monitored items in the subscription are continuously reporting fresh data.

DataSetWriterWatchdogBehavior.description: Defines what action to take when the watchdog timer triggers.

OpcNodeWatchdogCondition.description: Specifies the condition that triggers the watchdog behavior.

DataSetSamplingInterval.description: Default sampling interval in milliseconds for all monitored items in the dataset.

DataSetSamplingIntervalTimespan.description: Default sampling interval as TimeSpan for all monitored items in the dataset.

DefaultHeartbeatInterval.description: The interval in milliseconds at which to publish heartbeat messages.

DefaultHeartbeatIntervalTimespan.description: The heartbeat interval as TimeSpan for all nodes in this dataset.

DefaultHeartbeatBehavior.description: Configures how heartbeat messages are handled for all nodes.

samplingInterval.description: Adapted sampling interval property. Sets or gets DataSetSamplingInterval.

publishingInterval.description: Adapted publishing interval property. Sets or gets DataSetPublishingInterval.

keyFrameCount.description: Adapted key frame count property. Sets or gets DataSetKeyFrameCount.
